sourcesContent:
<template>
  <button @click="updateWeather" ref="updateButton" id="updateButton">Get Current</button>
  <OverallWeather ref="OverallWeather"/>
  <WeatherType ref="WeatherType"/>
  <WeekForcast ref="WeekForcast"/>
</template>

<script>
import OverallWeather from './components/OverallWeather.vue';
import WeatherType from './components/WeatherType.vue'
import WeekForcast from './components/WeekForcast.vue';
import { store } from './shared/store';

export default {
  name: 'App',
  components: {
    WeatherType,
    OverallWeather,
    WeekForcast,
  },
  data() {
    return {
      latitude: null,
      longitude: null,
      location: null
    }
  },
  async mounted() {
    const location = await store.getLocation();
    console.log('[App] Location: ', location);
    this.latitude = location.latitude;
    this.longitude = location.longitude;
    this.updateWeather();

    // FUTURE: update weather every 5 minutes
  },
  methods: {
    async updateWeather() {
      console.log('[App] Update Weather');
      const weather = await store.getWeather(this.latitude, this.longitude);
      console.log('[App] Weather: ', weather);
      this.$refs.OverallWeather.setWeather(weather);
      this.$refs.WeatherType.setWeather(weather);
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style>
#app {
  font-family: Avenir, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
  text-align: center;
  color: #2c3e50;
  height: 100%;

  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 40% 60%;
  grid-template-rows: 1fr 1fr;
  grid-template-areas:
    "overallWeather weatherType"
    "weekForcast weatherType";
}
#updateButton {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
}
</style>
